summary: Adds Lord Shadowscythe, a deadly shade necromancer, to High Hrothgar.
descriptionHtml:
A powerful necromancer failed in the most crucial part of the transformation into a lich, and so his soul was forever doomed to a skeletal shade. The greybeards took him in, as he was shunned everywhere. He knows many spells and might surprise you.

He is found in High Hrothgar.

This mod is compatable with follower tweaks mods as far as I can tell, as i use several myself. This is my first mod and I thank you all for the support. Any bug reports would help me greatly. 
Future plans: Might add a quest and some unique dialogue.

Workshop link: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=68406255
author: Diiablox
